test_cases.title: Verify accurate summary of research papers
preconditions: User has access to relevant research papers

steps.description: Research the main findings of a study.
steps.action: Open the research paper and copy-paste the main findings.

steps.description: Summarize the key points in a concise manner.
steps.action: Write a clear and concise summary using the copied text as reference.

test_cases.expected_result: A well-structured, easy-to-understand summary of the research papers.

test_cases.title: Test edge cases: Handling missing or outdated information
preconditions: User has access to relevant research papers

steps.description: Research a study with incomplete data.
steps.action: Try to find the main findings of the study, but notice missing information.

steps.description: Identify and report on any errors or inconsistencies in the summary.
steps.action: Highlight any mistakes in the summary, such as incorrect or misleading information.

test_cases.expected_result: A clear identification of errors or inconsistencies in the summary.

test_cases.title: Test negative scenarios: Handling missing data or out-of-date information
preconditions: User has access to relevant research papers

steps.description: Research a study with outdated or incomplete data.
steps.action: Realize that the summary is inaccurate due to missing information.

steps.description: Report on any errors or inconsistencies in the summary.
steps.action: Explain why the summary is incorrect and suggest improvements.

test_cases.expected_result: A clear explanation of why the summary is incorrect.
